379c162aac12eca2deca690287b54ad270cc2e40.name: Chet Haase
379c162aac12eca2deca690287b54ad270cc2e40.bio: Chet has been on the Android team since 2010, first as an engineer and then lead on the UI Toolkit team, then as Android's Chief Advocate on the developer relations team, and now as an engineer on the Android Graphics team. He enjoys hacking code for graphics, UI, performance, and then talking to developers about it at conferences like this.

4a7ca4c16cbe81a612bf3011a3d3439f85408103.name: Romain Guy
4a7ca4c16cbe81a612bf3011a3d3439f85408103.bio: Engineering director at Google on Android
